name: Grey Plague
description:
Year 2020.

 A mysterious disease has broken out. The disease is suspected to be a mutation of tuberculosis, which had been eliminated years ago. 

With the power to see peoples' internal organs, can you save everyone from Grey Plague?

Genre: educational / point-and-click adventure / visual novel / strategy

Playtime: 1-2 hours

-----

Contains lots of learning about biology so not for everyone. Made back in Jan-June 2017, pls forgive mistakes TT
